text: @SenSchumer It's May 16th, and Cuck Schumer is still a dishonest, divisive, unproductive and inadequate DemocRat Senator  who's done very little to help his state of NY! Especially, in regard to COVID19! He just passes the buck and due to his TDS, he blames everything on President Trump. Smh
